resources.string: Ithebhulethi yakho ayixhunyiwe ensizakalweni yedatha yeselula. Ukubuka lolu lwazi manje, yiya ku-%s kusiphequluli sewebhu.

Thinta uQalisa" ukuqalisa isevisi yeselula yakho manje. (Kungathatha amaminithi ambalwa.)
Noma thinta"Yeqa ukuhlela ithebhulethi yakho usebenzisa uxhumano lwe-Wi-Fi kunaloko.

"Kuze kube wenza uhlelo lokusebenza yedatha yakho isebenze, izinto eziningi eziqukethwe yithebhulethi yakho ngeke zisebenze.
Uma uncamela ukweqa manje, ungenza kusebenze esikhathini esizayo kuZilungiselelo Zohlelo."

"Insiza yedatha yakho ayenzekanga ukuthi isebenze. Lokhu kungaba yinkinga yesikhashana.
Uma uncamela ukweqa manje, qinisekisa ukuthi ukwenza kusebenze ngesikhathi esizayo kuZilungiselelo Zohlelo. Kuze kube wenza kusebenze, izinto eziningi eziqukethwe yithebhulethi yakho ngeke zisebenze."
Isevisi yedatha yeselula yakho ayikwazanga ukwenziwa isebenze. Lokhu kungaba inkinga yesikhashana, futhi ingaxazululwa ngokuthi ucishe uphinde uvule ithebhulethi yakho.

Kube nephutha elidinga ukucishwa bese iqaliswa kabusha ikhompyutha yakho ngaphambi kokwenza omunye umzamo wokuyenza isebenze. Ithebhulethi yakho izocisha ngokuzenzakalelayo kumasekhondi angu-60, noma ungathinta u-Cisha manje".
Uma ikhompyutha yakho isicimile, cindezela inkinobho Yamandla ukuze uyiqale kabusha."
Ithebhulethi yakho isethiwe futhi ikulungele ukusetshenziswa.
Ukuze ufake ikhadi lakho le-SIM, funda imiyalelo eze nethebulethi yakho.
